message: Starting critique - gathering phase handover and agent findings
Analyzing task status - found duplicate review spawning issue. Examining SQLite migration code
Found root cause: Retry worker thread spawns duplicate reviewers. Examining SQLite state transitions

Critique analysis completed. CANNOT submit formal critique due to SQLite schema bug ('no such column: final_verdict'). Found TWO critical bugs: (1) Duplicate review spawning from retry worker thread (real_mcp_server.py:3506-3532) - spawns second batch without checking if review exists. (2) SQLite schema incomplete - reviews table missing 'num_reviewers' and 'phase_name' columns queried by get_reviews_for_task():2469. Deliverables verified: reviewer_agent_id IS properly tracked in SQLite (reviews.reviewer_agent_ids JSON array + review_verdicts.reviewer_agent_id column). Test succeeded but exposed critical bugs in production code.
